ai-patthana16.7:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.7:1.1_0: It is not by way of speaking, or by has no support, nor is the condition for the support of the teaching.
ai-patthana16.7:1.1_1: Not understanding is a condition for the unprofitable, not for the purpose of investigating the teaching. It is a condition for the support condition.
ai-patthana16.7:1.1_2: Not understanding is a condition for the unprofitable, not for the purpose of investigating the teaching. It is a condition for the support condition.
ai-patthana16.7:1.1_3: It is not abandoned in being unprofitable condition, and skilled in loss, and skilled in means of the teaching, and conditioned by the wrong way.
ai-patthana16.7:1.1_4: It is not abandoned in being unprofitable, not skilled in lawfulness, and skilled in making way for the purpose of indulging in Dhamma.
ai-patthana16.7:2.1_0: when five supports have fallen upon the five objects (of rebirths), in the five respects).
